events.name: What the Hack! It's National Day! Party
events.description:
What’s happening?
Come and celebrate National Day Eve with us! Grab a cold one, meet like-minded Developers, Digital Marketers and Designers and have some fun with our friendly Talent Community team!
We are excited to meet you and can’t wait to share more news about our upcoming community events in Singapore! Drinks and snacks are on us, so see you there!

Who are we?
GetLinks is the largest online tech talent network in Asia, Connecting Tech Talents to jobs in Asia’s most Innovative Companies. Headquartered in Bangkok and with offices in Singapore, Vietnam and Hong Kong, we focus on 3D roles; “Developer”, “Designer “and” Digital Marketer”, which are primary forces to build a startup. Our community exists of 500,000 users and we just entered Singapore early this year and expand our local community over here. Our role is more than providing jobs. We are facilitators of meaningful connections and pioneers of creating an ecosystem of the Adaptive Talent Community.

Wait, there’s more!
Our events are focused on building community by tapping into trend topics with the best speakers and panel members. We do this across Singapore to ensure our events varies from social meetups to educational sessions. Our events will be held on a weekly basis and we have just introduced a series called Hacking Thursdays. Do look forward to future community events from us here at GetLinks!
events.location: SOS Bar Restaurant, 6 Marina Boulevard, Singapore 018985
